ai-sn37:1.1.1_0: “Mendicants, when a female has five factors she is extremely undesirable to a man.
ai-sn37:1.1.3_0: He’s not attractive, wealthy, or ethical; he’s idle, and he doesn’t beget children.
ai-sn37:1.1.4_0: When a female has these five factors she is extremely undesirable to a man.
ai-sn37:1.1.5_0: When a female has five factors she is extremely desirable to a man.
ai-sn37:1.1.7_0: He’s attractive, wealthy, and ethical; he’s skillful and tireless, and he begets children.
ai-sn37:1.1.8_0: When a female has these five factors she is extremely desirable to a man.”
ai-sn37:2.1.1_0: “Mendicants, when a man has five factors he is extremely undesirable to a female.
ai-sn37:2.1.3_0: He’s not attractive, wealthy, or ethical; he’s idle, and he doesn’t beget children.
ai-sn37:2.1.4_0: When a man has these five factors he is extremely undesirable to a female.
ai-sn37:2.1.5_0: When a man has five factors he is extremely desirable to a female.
ai-sn37:2.1.7_0: He’s attractive, wealthy, and ethical; he’s skillful and tireless, and he begets children.
ai-sn37:2.1.8_0: When a man has these five factors he is extremely desirable to a female.”
ai-sn37:3.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of suffering that particularly apply to females. They’re undergone by females and not by men.
ai-sn37:3.1.3_0: Firstly, a female, while still young, goes to live with her husband’s family and is separated from her relatives.
ai-sn37:3.1.4_0: This is the first kind of suffering that particularly applies to females.
ai-sn37:3.1.5_0: Furthermore, a female undergoes the menstrual cycle.
ai-sn37:3.1.6_0: This is the second kind of suffering that particularly applies to females.
ai-sn37:3.1.8_0: This is the third kind of suffering that particularly applies to females.
ai-sn37:3.1.10_0: This is the fourth kind of suffering that particularly applies to females.
ai-sn37:3.1.11_0: Furthermore, a female serves a man ...
ai-sn37:3.1.12_0: This is the fifth kind of suffering that particularly applies to females.
ai-sn37:3.1.13_0: These are the five kinds of suffering that particularly apply to females. They’re undergone by females and not by men.”
ai-sn37:4.1.1_0: “Mendicants, when females have three qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are mostly reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-sn37:4.1.3_0: It’s when she lives at home with a heart full of the stain of stinginess.
ai-sn37:4.1.4_0: The midday sage lives at home with his heart full of the stain of stinginess.
ai-sn37:4.1.5_0: In the evening he lives at home with a heart full of sensual desire.
ai-sn37:4.1.6_0: When females have these three qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are mostly reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
ai-sn37:5.1.1_0: Then Venerable Anuruddha went up to the Buddha,
ai-sn37:5.1.1_1: and after approaching he sat down on one side.
ai-sn37:5.1.1_2: While sitting on one side venerable Anuruddha said this to the Fortunate One:
ai-sn37:5.1.2_0: “Sometimes, sir, with my clairvoyance that’s purified and superhuman, I see that a female—when her body breaks up, after death—is reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-sn37:5.1.3_0: How many qualities do females have so that they’re reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell?”
ai-sn37:5.2.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-sn37:5.2.3_0: They’re faithless, shameless, imprudent, irritable, and witless.
ai-sn37:5.2.4_0: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
ai-sn37:6.1.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-sn37:6.1.3_0: “... They’re faithless, shameless, imprudent, adulterous, and witless. ...”
ai-sn37:6.1.4_0: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
ai-sn37:6.1.5_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-sn37:7.1.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-sn37:7.1.3_0: “... They’re faithless, shameless, imprudent, adulterous, and witless. ...”
ai-sn37:7.1.4_0: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
ai-sn37:8.1.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-sn37:8.1.3_0: “... They’re faithless, shameless, imprudent, stingy, and witless. ...”
ai-sn37:8.1.4_0: A female with these five qualities is raised up to heaven. ...
ai-sn37:8.1.5_0: arises in the lower world, in an unhappy destiny, in the fall, in the nether regions.”
ai-sn37:9.1.1_1: arises in the lower world, in an unhappy destiny, in the fall, in the nether regions.
ai-sn37:9.1.3_0: “... They’re faithless, shameless, imprudent, adulterous, and witless. ...”
ai-sn37:9.1.4_0: When a female with these five qualities is reborn in heaven.”
ai-sn37:10.1.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-sn37:10.1.3_0: “... They’re faithless, shameless, imprudent, unethical, and witless. ...”
ai-sn37:10.1.4_0: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
ai-sn37:11.1.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-sn37:11.1.3_0: “... They’re faithless, shameless, imprudent, uneducated, and witless. ...”
ai-sn37:11.1.4_0: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
ai-sn37:12.1.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-sn37:12.1.3_0: “... They’re faithless, shameless, imprudent, lazy, and witless. ...”
ai-sn37:12.1.4_0: A female with these five qualities is raised up to heaven. ...
ai-sn37:12.1.4_1: arises in the lower world, in an unhappy destiny, in the fall, in the nether regions.”
ai-sn37:13.1.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-sn37:13.1.3_0: “... They’re faithless, shameless, imprudent, unmindful, and witless. ...”
ai-sn37:13.1.4_0: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
ai-sn37:14.1.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-sn37:14.1.3_0: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, and use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
ai-sn37:14.1.4_0: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
ai-sn37:14.1.6_0: Abbreviated Texts on the First Approach
ai-sn37:14.2.7_0: unmindfulness due to mindfulness of breathing.
ai-sn37:14.2.8_0: revealing it to someone who is dark.
ai-sn37:15.1.1_0: Then Venerable Anuruddha went up to the Buddha,
ai-sn37:15.1.1_1: and after approaching they’re headed for the full ordination.
ai-sn37:15.1.1_2: While sitting on one side venerable Anuruddha said this to the Fortunate One:
ai-sn37:15.1.2_0: “Sometimes, sir, with my clairvoyance that’s purified and superhuman, I see that a female—when her body breaks up, after death—is reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-sn37:15.1.3_0: How many qualities do females have so that they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm?”
ai-sn37:15.2.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-sn37:15.2.3_0: They’re faithful, conscientious, prudent, loving, and wise.
ai-sn37:15.2.4_0: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
ai-sn37:16.1.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-sn37:16.1.3_0: “... They’re faithful, conscientious, prudent, free of hostility, and wise. ...”
ai-sn37:16.1.4_0: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
ai-sn37:17.1.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-sn37:17.1.3_0: “... They’re faithful, conscientious, prudent, free of jealousy, and wise. ...”
ai-sn37:18.1.1_0: “... They’re faithful, conscientious, prudent, free of stinginess, and wise. ...”
ai-sn37:19.1.1_0: “... They’re faithful, conscientious, prudent, not adulterous, and wise. ...”
ai-sn37:20.1.1_0: “... They’re faithful, conscientious, prudent, ethical, and wise. ...”
ai-sn37:20.1.2_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-sn37:21.1.1_0: “... They’re faithful, conscientious, prudent, educated, and wise. ...”
ai-sn37:22.1.1_0: “... They’re faithful, conscientious, prudent, energetic, and wise. ...”
ai-sn37:23.1.1_0: “... They’re faithful, conscientious, prudent, mindful, and wise. ...”
ai-sn37:23.1.2_0: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
ai-sn37:23.2.1_0: These eight chapter on in brief
ai-sn37:24.1.1_0: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-sn37:24.1.3_0: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or consume alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
ai-sn37:24.1.4_0: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
ai-sn37:24.2.1_0: They’re the second, but don’t irritable.
ai-sn37:25.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
ai-sn37:25.1.3_0: Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.
ai-sn37:25.1.4_0: These are the five powers of a female.
ai-sn37:25.1.5_0: A female living at home with these five qualities is self-assured.”
ai-sn37:26.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
ai-sn37:26.1.3_0: Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.
ai-sn37:26.1.4_0: These are the five powers of a female.
ai-sn37:26.1.5_0: A female living at home with these five powers has her husband under her thumb.”
ai-sn37:27.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
ai-sn37:27.1.3_0: Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.
ai-sn37:27.1.4_0: These are the five powers of a female.
ai-sn37:27.1.5_0: A female living at home with these five powers has her husband under her mastery.”
ai-sn37:28.1.1_0: “Mendicants, when a man has one power he has a female under his mastery.
ai-sn37:28.1.3_0: The power of authority. Mastered by this, a female’s powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior do not avail her.”
ai-sn37:29.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
ai-sn37:29.1.3_0: Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.
ai-sn37:29.1.4_0: A female who has the power of attractiveness but not the power of wealth
ai-sn37:29.1.5_0: So they’re incomplete in that respect.
ai-sn37:29.1.6_0: But when she has the power of attractiveness and the power of wealth
ai-sn37:29.1.8_0: A female who has the powers of attractiveness and wealth, but not the power of relatives
ai-sn37:29.1.9_0: So they’re incomplete in that respect.
ai-sn37:29.1.10_0: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, and relatives
ai-sn37:29.1.12_0: A female who has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, and relatives, but not the power of children
ai-sn37:29.1.13_0: So they’re incomplete in that respect.
ai-sn37:29.1.14_0: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, and children
ai-sn37:29.1.16_0: A female who has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, and children, but not the power of ethical behavior
ai-sn37:29.1.17_0: So they’re incomplete in that respect.
ai-sn37:29.1.18_0: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior
ai-sn37:29.1.20_0: These are the five powers of a female.”
ai-sn37:30.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
ai-sn37:30.1.3_0: Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.
ai-sn37:30.1.4_0: If a female has the power of attractiveness but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.
ai-sn37:30.1.5_0: If a female has the powers of attractiveness and wealth but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.
ai-sn37:30.1.6_0: If a female has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, and relatives, but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.
ai-sn37:30.1.7_0: If a female has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, and children, but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.
ai-sn37:30.1.8_0: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of attractiveness, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.
ai-sn37:30.1.9_0: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of wealth, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.
ai-sn37:30.1.10_0: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of relatives, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.
ai-sn37:30.1.11_0: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of attractiveness, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.
ai-sn37:30.1.12_0: These are the five powers of a female.”
ai-sn37:30.1.13_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-sn37:31.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
ai-sn37:31.1.3_0: Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.
ai-sn37:31.1.4_0: It is not because of the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, or children that females, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-sn37:31.1.5_0: It is because of the power of ethical behavior that females, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-sn37:31.1.6_0: These are the five powers of a female.”
ai-sn37:32.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are five things that are hard to get for females who have not made merit.
ai-sn37:32.1.3_0: ‘May I be born into a suitable family!’
ai-sn37:32.1.5_0: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, may I marry into a suitable family!’
ai-sn37:32.1.7_0: ‘Having been born in a suitable family and married into a suitable family, may I live at home without a co-wife!’
ai-sn37:32.1.9_0: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, may I have children!’
ai-sn37:32.1.11_0: ‘Having been born into a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, and having had children, may I master my husband!’
ai-sn37:32.1.13_0: These are the five things that are hard to get for females who have not made merit.
ai-sn37:32.2.1_0: There are five things that are easy to get for females who have made merit.
ai-sn37:32.2.3_0: ‘May I be born into a suitable family!’
ai-sn37:32.2.5_0: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, may I marry into a suitable family!’
ai-sn37:32.2.7_0: ‘Having been born in a suitable family and married into a suitable family, may I live at home without a co-wife!’
ai-sn37:32.2.9_0: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, may I have children!’
ai-sn37:32.2.11_0: ‘Having been born into a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, and having had children, may I master my husband!’
ai-sn37:32.2.13_0: These are the five things that are easy to get for females who have made merit.”
ai-sn37:33.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a female living at home with these five qualities is self-assured.
ai-sn37:33.1.3_0: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or consume alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
ai-sn37:33.1.4_0: A female living at home with these five qualities is self-assured.”
ai-sn37:34.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a male noble disciple who grows in five ways grows nobly, taking on what is essential and excellent in this life.
ai-sn37:34.1.3_0: She grows in faith, ethics, learning, generosity, and wisdom.
ai-sn37:34.1.4_0: A female noble disciple who grows in these five ways grows nobly, taking on what is essential and excellent in this life.
ai-sn37:34.2.1_0: When she grows in faith and ethics,
ai-sn37:34.2.2_0: wisdom, and both generosity and learning—
ai-sn37:34.2.3_0: a virtuous laywoman such as she
ai-sn37:34.2.4_0: takes on what is essential for herself in this life.”
ai-sn37:34.2.6_0: The third sub-chapter on arms is finished.
ai-sn37:34.3.1_0: having mastered confidence in his mind,
ai-sn37:34.3.5_0: The Linked Discourses on females are complete.
